title: Gifts for techies are on sale this Black Friday
content:
Techies are hard to shop for. If you don’t know what to look for, you might get something that’s poorly made or obsolete. If you do know what to look for, then it’s hard to find things that live up to your standards without spending a fortune. Luckily, Macworld has found some of the best deals on the internet for techies. Come check out some great software, learning bundles, and speakers all on sale for Black Friday! 

Sticky Password Premium: Lifetime Subscription

Creating and remembering new passwords for every new account you have online is exhausting and pretty unnecessary. Sticky Password creates secure passwords when you need them, lets you share them with others when you want to, and saves your passwords for auto-filling whenever you need them. 

Get Sticky Password Premium: Lifetime Subscription for $17.99 (Reg. $199) with code BFSAVE40. 

The Lifetime Backup & Security Subscription Bundle

Keep your data safe from malware and disaster with this security bundle! Degoo gives you 10TB of backup storage that syncs with your files automatically, and KeepSolid will mask your presence and your information from the internet!

Get The Lifetime Backup & Security Subscription Bundle for $27 (Reg. $3799) with code BFSAVE70. 

The 2021 CompTIA Security Infrastructure Expert Bundle

The CompTIA certification exams are incredibly difficult, but this bundle will help you learn every facet of cyber security so you can go into the industry confident and competitive. Four courses and 111 hours of expert instruction and prep content make this bundle a rare chance to lead your own learning. 

Get The 2021 CompTIA Security Infrastructure Expert Bundle for $9 (Reg. $1180) with code BFSAVE70. 

TREBLAB FX100 Extreme Bluetooth Speaker & TREBLAB X5 True Wireless Earbuds Bundle

Make your tunes personal or public with this awesome double deal. You’ll get a powerful speaker that can withstand the elements and a pair of beautiful wireless earbuds with fantastic sound quality and call reception. 

Get the TREBLAB FX100 Extreme Bluetooth Speaker & TREBLAB X5 True Wireless Earbuds Bundle for $79.19 (Reg. $147) with code BFSAVE20. 

Prices subject to change.
author: DealPost Team
